name: Gloves of the Adder
data: It increases the users strength adequately.
It increases the users wisdom adequately.
It has adequate armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
It increases the users acid resistance somewhat.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'parry'.
It increases the users fire resistance somewhat.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'quick chant'.
Gloves of the Adder are a holy artifact of the goddess Kirvana.
The wearer of the gloves could 'grab' another player.
